name: Eternal Eyes
description:
Eternal Eyes is a strategic RPG in which you create your own little creatures, or 'Mappets'. Enlisted to do your dirty work, these guys live in the magical Gross Kingdom, and are under threat from Vorless, an evil military boss who wants to cull them. But now the Mappets need help, so they turn to a group of fearless kids to stop Vorless in his deadly scheme.

With the capacity for you to build up to 150 unique characters, each with their own powers, Eternal Eyes combines gripping battle gameplay with inspired graphics to provide a riveting RPG experience.
